entry.altNames: snake bite, snake bites, snake envenomation, snake envenoming
entry.decription: injury caused by a bite from a snake
entry.name: snakebite

entry.altNames: Lemierre syndrome, acute sore throat, human necrobacillosis, postanginal sepsis
entry.decription: Human disease: infectious thrombophlebitis of the internal jugular vein
entry.name: Lemierre's syndrome

entry.altNames: non-bacterial thrombotic endocarditis, non-infective endocarditis, nonbacterial thrombotic endocarditis
entry.decription: endocarditis that results from the deposition of small sterile vegetations on valve leaflets
entry.name: marantic endocarditis

entry.decription: focal dystonia that is characterized by distortions of the mouth and tongue.
entry.name: oromandibular dystonia

entry.altNames: bouba, Endemic treponematoses, frambesia, frambesia tropica, frambosie, polypapilloma tropicum, thymosis, Treponema pertenue infection
entry.decription: Human disease: tropical infection of the skin, bones and joints caused by the spirochete bacterium Treponema pallidum pertenue
entry.name: yaws

entry.Hindi_description: सचीज़ोफ्रेनिया के बारे में मेरा विचार
entry.altNames: mental or behavioural disorder, psychotic disorder, psychotic disorders
entry.decription: abnormal condition of the mind that involves a loss of contact with reality
entry.name: psychosis
